custom_steps_separated.content: When the user enables Display Zoom on their iPhone 6 or 6 Plus - https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/IAB-9242
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the application's views will continue to display properly
And the format of each view will match that of the Standard zoom display

custom_steps_separated.content:
Download the .ipa (i.e. From HockeyApp)
Change .ipa extension to .zip
Unzip
In “Payload” folder, locate executable (target name, i.e. AtBat.Full)

In Terminal, do
lipo –info (path to executable/AtBat.Full.app/AtBatFull)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Example results
Architectures in the fat file: AtBat.Full are: armv7 arm64

custom_steps_separated.content:
Verify the environment string URLs can be overridden and updated via config change.

eg URLs here: (http://wapqa.mlb.com/atbat/iphone/environmentStrings/json/8.3.0/config.json) 
Can be modified and the app should reflect the update.

Case: Player cards updated to new endpoint.
custom_steps_separated.expected: The url for requests should be able to be updated on the fly without requiring app release.
